lines.text: Gee, Wilby, you know I like you much better as a dog.
Hey, Wilby, what is it this time?
What about the seven bucks I loaned you?
Cough it up. Pop pulled the plug on my allowance.
Gee, pal, I'd like to help you out, but you know how it is. I've got a date with Allison.
I'm sick and tired of financing your romances.
I'd rather not know how you get your gossip. Uh, what else do you know about them?
Frankly, I think that dogs don't like mailmen because... well, because sometimes they bring bad news. Animals sense those things, you know.
There is nothing wrong with girls; they're character building.
